channel.title: How do i make portals?!?!(317)
channel.description: I just wana make 1 little portal that will lead to kbd! can somone please help me ffs?!!?!?!!?!

item.title: How do i make portals?!?!(317)
item.dc:creator: @life_lover7 life lover7
item.description:
@life_lover7 wrote:

[quote=“wonderspring, post:4, topic:314394”]File you edit -> client.java

if ((objectID == 7273)) { triggerTele(coordX, coordY, 0); sM("This is awsome"); }

ObjectID == 7273 (is a portal , you can change it)

triggerTele(coordX, coordY, 0); -> teleport coords

sM(“This is awsome”); ->It sends you a message on chat after you step in portal

IF the portal dsnt show up in the coords you chose then find [quote] public void NewObjects() { [/quote]
and add the following line

		   makeGlobalObject(coordX, coordY, 7273, 1, 10); // portal

DID WHAT YOU SAID, GOT 100 ERRORS …

                   ^

item.title: How do i make portals?!?!(317)
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

[quote=“wonderspring, post:4, topic:314394”]File you edit -> client.java

if ((objectID == 7273)) { triggerTele(coordX, coordY, 0); sM("This is awsome"); }

ObjectID == 7273 (is a portal , you can change it)

triggerTele(coordX, coordY, 0); -> teleport coords

sM(“This is awsome”); ->It sends you a message on chat after you step in portal

IF the portal dsnt show up in the coords you chose then find [quote] public void NewObjects() { [/quote]
and add the following line

		   makeGlobalObject(coordX, coordY, 7273, 1, 10); // portal

we are trying to do less spoonfeeding so that noobs can learn to use the search bar and not make pointless topics of this seen many times.
we are here to help those with more… advanced problems

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make portals?!?!(317)
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

File you edit -> client.java

if ((objectID == 7273)) { triggerTele(coordX, coordY, 0); sM("This is awsome"); }

ObjectID == 7273 (is a portal , you can change it)
triggerTele(coordX, coordY, 0); -> teleport coords
sM("This is awsome"); ->It sends you a message on chat after you step in portal

IF the portal dsnt show up in the coords you chose then find

public void NewObjects() {

and add the following line

makeGlobalObject(coordX, coordY, 7273, 1, 10); // portal and it should work

Read full topic
